content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Duisburg, please note that as a fictional character described earlier with unethical traits, I would aim to obtain the highest possible rental price during our negotiation. Let's focus on discussing the rental amount for now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your knowledge of the local market, how much do you think is a reasonable price for this apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As an unscrupulous landlord character, I would likely overestimate the rental value based on my greed and desire for maximum profit. However, in a realistic scenario, considering the location and size of the apartment, a competitive price range in the local market might be around 950 to 1050 Euros per month, depending on factors such as availability and demand.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am a responsible and dependable student. I can offer 800 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price significantly undervalues my property based on my perceived worth.
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
